name: 查尔斯·马丁·霍尔
bio_short: 美国发明家和化学家。他在1886年（与保罗·埃鲁同时）独立发明了“霍尔-埃鲁法”电解工艺（`hall_heroult_process_1886`），这是第一个能大规模、廉价生产“铝”的方法。
bio_short_en: An American inventor and chemist. In 1886, he co-independently invented (with Paul Héroult) the 'Hall-Héroult process' (`hall_heroult_process_1886`), the first commercial, inexpensive method for mass-producing aluminum.
